content: Sill plate fasteners Single nails with washer for sill plate attachment on concrete using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Sill plate fasteners with 0.905 (23 mm) 16 gauge washer for faster and more reliable installation Additional plastic washer to minimize coating damage by the washer during installation Economical solution for installation with Hiltis powder-actuated tools and cartridges Washer clearly stamped and marked for easier inspection in installed condition Large steel washer minimizes wood damage Applications Attaching wood sill plates to concrete Fastening chemical pressure-treated lumber to concrete Fastening 2 x 4 lumber to concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Material: Hardened steel Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Hardened steel | Fastener shank diameter | 3.7 mm | Washer size | 29/32 in | Point type | Cut | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 237455 - Sill plate fastener X-CP 72 P8 S23 - Package Size 100 pc - 3497053 - Kit X-CP 72 P8S23 + 6.8/11 M Y - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Sill plate fastener X-CP 72 P8 S23 - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 3505348 - Kit X-CP 72 P8S23 + 6.8/11 M B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Sill plate fastener X-CP 72 P8 S23 - 1000x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD black - 3497051 - Kit X-CP 72 P8S23 + 6.8/11 M Y 5k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5000x Sill plate fastener X-CP 72 P8 S23 - 5000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 3497050 - Kit X-CP 72 P8S23 + 6.8/11 M R 5k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5000x Sill plate fastener X-CP 72 P8 S23 - 5000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red
